item.title: Adventures of a smartwatch in Paris [UPDATE: MYSTERY SOLVED]
item.description: Follow along using this map made with Felt One day this past July, I got up early and started a long run around Paris. I’ve found this practice to be the easiest way to explore without being an insufferable tourist. As I usually do, I started tracking the run with my Garmin Forerunner 245 watch. My watch, unbeknownst to me, decided that I was actually starting 3km South, near the Institut Curie.
